Verses: 2 karththaavE, neer veLippaduththinadhai naan kEttEn, enakku bayamuNdaayitru; karththaavE, varushangaLin naduvilE ummudaiya kiriyaiyai uyirppiyum, varushangaLin naduvilE adhai viLangappaNNum, kObiththaalum irakkaththai ninaiththaruLum.
3 dhEvan thEmaanilirundhum, parisuththar paaraan parvadhaththilirundhum vandhaar; sElaa. avarudaiya magimai vaanangaLai moodikkoNdadhu; avar thudhiyinaal boomi niRaindhadhu.
4 avarudaiya pragaasam sooriyanaippOlirundhadhu; avarudaiya karaththilirundhu kiraNangaL veesina; angE avarudaiya paraakkiramam maRaindhirundhadhu.
5 avarukku munbaagak koLLainOi sendradhu; avar adigaLilirundhu eripandhamaana kaaichchal puRappattadhuï¿½.

6 avar nindru boomiyai aLandhaar; avar paarththup puRajaadhigaLaik karaiyappaNNinaar; poorva parvadhangaL sidhaRadikkappattadhu, endrumuLLa malaigaL thaazhndhadhu; avarudaiya nadaigaL niththiya nadaigaLaayirundhadhu.
7 kooshaanin koodaarangaL varuththaththil adappattirukkakkaNdEn; meedhiyaan dhEsaththin thiraigaL nadungina.

8 karththar nadhigaLinmEl kObamaayirundhaarO? dhEvareer ummudaiya kudhiraigaLinmElum ratchippuNdaakkugiRa ummudaiya radhangaLinmElum ERivarugiRapOdhu, umadhu kObam nadhigaLukkum umadhu sinam samuththiraththiRkum virOdhamaayirundhadhO?
9 kOththirangaLukku aaNaiyittukkoduththa vaakkinpadiyE ummudaiya vil naaNEtrappattadhaaga viLanginadhu; sElaa. neer boomiyaip piLandhu aaRugaLai uNdaakkineer.
10 parvadhangaL ummaik kaNdu nadungina; jalam pravaagiththuk kadandhupOyitru, aazhi iraindhadhu, adhin kaigaLai uyara eduththadhu.
11 sandhiranum sooriyanum thanthan maNdalaththil nindrana; umadhu ambugaLin jOdhiyilum, umadhu eettiyinudaiya minnal pragaasaththilum nadandhana.
12 neer kObaththOdE boomiyil nadandheer, ukkiraththOdE jaadhigaLaip pOradiththeer.

13 umadhu janaththin ratchippukkaagavum neer abishEgam paNNuviththavanin ratchippukkaavumE neer puRappatteer. kazhuththaLavaaga aSthibaaraththaith thiRappaakki, dhushtanudaiya veettilirundha thalaivanai vettineer; sElaa.

14 ennai sidhaRadippadhaRkup perunkaatraippOl vandhaargaL; siRumaiyaanavanai maRaividaththilE patchippadhu avargaLukku sandhOshamaayirundhadhu, neer avanudaiya eettigaLinaalEyE avanudaiya graamaththu adhipadhigaLai uruvak kuththineer.
15 thiraLaana thaNNeer kuviyalaagiya samuththiraththukkuL umadhu kudhiraigaLOdE nadandhupOneer.

16 naan kEttapozhudhu en kudal kuzhambitru; andha saththaththukku en udhadugaL thudiththadhu; en elumbugaLil ukkal uNdaayitru; en nilaiyilE nadunginEn; aanaalum engaLOdE edhirkkum janangaL varumpOdhu, ikkattunaaLilE naan iLaippaaRudhal adaivEn.

17 aththimaram thuLirvidaamaRpOnaalum, dhraatchachchedigaLil pazham uNdaagaamaRpOnaalum, olivamaraththinpalan atruppOnaalum, vayalgaL dhaaniyaththai viLaiviyaamaRpOnaalum, kidaiyil aattumandhaigaL mudhalatruppOnaalum, thozhuvaththilE maadu illaamaRpOnaalum,
18 naan karththarukkuL magizhchchiyaayiruppEn, en ratchippin dhEvanukkuL kaLikooruvEn.

19 aaNdavaraagiya karththar enbelan; avar en kaalgaLai maankaalgaLaippOlaakki, uyaramaana SthalangaLil ennai nadakkappaNNuvaar. idhu neginOdh ennum vaaththiyaththil vaasikka raagaththalaivanukku oppuvikkappatta sangeedham.
